Description: * {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Infernal Resilience}} increased from 11% to 12%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Uppercut air control lockout period reduced from 0.5s to 0.3s
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} damage spirit scaling increased from 1.4 to 1.8
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} T3 now also adds +1 Charge
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} now has updated impact SFX
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} now has an arming effect for when they are about to detonate
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} only heals when hitting heroes
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} fixed VFX to match the damage area more accurately
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} updated to break {{PageRef|Breakable|alt_name=breakable}}s in the area
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} fixed a bug where calico's slash would deal no damage near walls
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} duration reduced from 20s to 15s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} cooldown reduced from 50s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} now gets slowed by 30% for 1s anytime she takes damage
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} speed reduced from 75% to 65%
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} T2 speed increased from +35% to +45%
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} now can now meow with m1
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Return to Shadows}} cooldown increased from 80s to 90s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} doing bonus damage from {{PageRef|Melee Charge}}
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Snare}} cooldown reduced from 37s to 34s
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Snare}} T2 increased from +0.5s to +0.75s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} T3 increased from +40% Evasion to +60%
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} T3 increased from +2 Dance Move Speed to +3
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} will no longer arm instantly if the player has the {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} modifier
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} Charge Time increased from 1s to 2s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} knock up time reduced by 15%
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} no will no longer expire after 5 seconds in the air
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} spirit scaling reduced from 0.9 to 0.4
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} will now play a different sound on the player's first bounce when the stomp modifier is active
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} VFX and lifetime display improved
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}} will now be more responsive for the player when landing and dealing damage
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lasso}} duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lasso}} duration now lasts 1.5s longer when using {{PageRef|Bounce Pad}}
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Lasso}} Fixed an issue where the lasso animation would get stuck on sometimes
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} now also slows roll distances by 20%
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} secondary ability delay reduced from 2s to 0.25s
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} no longer stops after hitting a {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=Soul}} {{PageRef|Orb}}
* Sinclair: No longer has -35% Headshot Damage Reduction

* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} damage mechanics reworked, increases damage as the bolt travels, various values adjusted (150 max damage, 75 min damage, 2s time for max damage, assistant does 50% damage. T3 is now +150 max damage, +50% assistant damage)
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} T2 updated to remove base fire rate debuff, add as t2 upgrade, remove spirit shred t2
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} allow for retarget to try to find targets through walls and to bend around corners
* Sinclair: Rabbit can now use jump
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} projectile updated to better track targets that have recently changes models
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} update VFX radius & lifetimes to scale off of clone damage
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} cooldown with successful usage reduced from 100% to 50%
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} stolen ultimate duration increased from 10s to 20s
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} VFX updated steal effect to feel snappier
* Sinclair: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} fixed a typo in the ability description
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Bullet damage reduced from 11.7 to 11.4
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Crow projectile speed reduced from 4750 to 4250
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} T2 reduced from +120 to +110
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} turn rate improved by 10%
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Bullet damage growth increased from 0.32 to 0.36
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Petrifying Bola}} changed the petrify to no longer be {{PageRef|Breakable|alt_name=breakable}}
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}} updated to deal damage through petrify, rather than cleanse the petrify and damage
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}} T2 anti-heal not working properly
* All objectives now take 50% less damage from Spirit Damage (abilities no longer have one off values for this)
* {{PageRef|Shrine}}s are no longer vulnerable to Spirit Damage when out of range (rather than only immune to bullet damage)
* Can no longer stand on top of {{PageRef|Walker}}s
* {{PageRef|Ammo Scavenger}}: Ammo reduced from 15% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Swift Striker}}: Fire Rate reduced from 22% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Base damage reduced from 50 to 45
* {{PageRef|Spellslinger Headshots}}: Amp per headshot increased from 4% to 6%
* {{PageRef|Spellslinger Headshots}}: Max Stacks reduced from 12 to 10
* {{PageRef|Bullet Lifesteal}}: Lifesteal reduced from 26% to 24%
* {{PageRef|Heroic Aura}}: Lifesteal reduced from 18% to 16%
* {{PageRef|Berserker}}: Damage to gain stack increased from 100 to 120
